name: EFDC Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: An EFDC file is a file that has been renamed and encrypted by EFDC ransomware, which is malware distributed by cybercriminals. It contains a normal file, such as a document, song, video, or image, that the ransomware is holding hostage. EFDC files cannot be decrypted.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
